mapper.select: SELECT * FROM `event` ORDER BY id DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `event` SET regDate = NOw(), updateDate = now(), beginDt = #{beginDt}, endDt = #{endDt}, genreId = #{genreId}, location = #{location}, title = #{title}, detail = #{detail}, duration = #{duration};
mapper.update: UPDATE `event` SET updateDate = NOW(), beginDt = #{beginDt}, endDt = #{endDt}, genreId = #{genreId}, location = #{location}, title = #{title}, detail = #{detail}, duration = #{duration} WHERE id = #{id};
